idea: We, Sperantes Healthcare Solutions Private Limited, have created analytics driven healthcare system, which would easily connect a patient to an array of doctors, caregivers, and 24x7 available coordinators who track and maintain all their follow-ups and medical records ensuring optimal compliance to care plans. The challenge to overcome was to get this done for the patient in a cost-effective way.
name: SPERANTES HEALTHCARE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
(DK9 DIAMOND TRADING LLP)


To carry on the business of dealers, traders, manufacturers, refiners, processors, assayers and investors in metals, bullion, gold, silver, diamonds, precious stones, ornaments and jewellery , coins and to carry on the work of manufacturing of jewellery items made of any metals, to carry on the trading in bullion, silver and jewellery items whether as wholesalers or retailers, exporters, importers, job-workers, consignors, contractors, vendors, stockiest, distributors of precious and semi precious decorative stones, imitation, synthetic, distributors of precious and semi precious, decorative stones, imitation, synthetic, natural and other varieties of stones and materials whatsoever such items and promote brands in the line of business.

idea:
Capwise is a diversified financial services company including services like advisory, financing and broking and asset management.

We offer full-fledged investment banking services to our clients which include debt syndication, private equity advisory, M&A, debt capital markets, distressed asset advisory and credit rating advisory.

Our in-depth understanding and knowledge of financial services space in India enables us to provide innovative solutions and derive maximum value for our clients.

At Capwise, we work closely with our clients to understand their needs and support them in their growth strategies and provide them apt solutions.
name: Capwise Financial Services Private Limited

idea:
The HEENANEHA INTERNATIONAL LLP carries on

1) To carry on business in India and Abroad to manufacture and trading of all kind of Greeting Cards, Posters, Gift items, candles, toys, raakhi, wax items, artificial jewellery and other fashion accessories, plastic items and other Gift items.

2) To carry on the business as manufactures, traders, sellers, distributors, agents, stockists, exporters and importer of all kinds of ceramic items, ceramic mugs, crokery, crystal glass wares, glass and glass wares, quotations, photo frames, photo album, pictures frames, metal and metallic gift items, gift boxes, paper products of all kinds, stationery items, plaster of paris items, games of all types, dry flowers, artificial flowers, pot pourri, fresh flowers, balloons, ribbons, masks and other decorative items and home décor items, etc.

3) To carry on business in India and Abroad of manufacturing trading, buy, sell, re-sell, supply, import, export, transport, store, forward, distribute, dispose, develop, handle, manipulate, market, supply or otherwise to deal in all types furniture, furniture made from wood, brass, steel, fibre glass, plastics or any other alloys, wooden beading and mouldings, wooden packing cases, handicrafts, house furnishers, hirers, repairers, cleaners of furniture, carpets, linoleum, furnishing fabrics and other floor covering and glass wood fittings and all things capable of being used therewith or in the maintenance and repair thereof and consulting relating to interiors & decorators and to provide design & consultancy services for interiors decorators and to carry on business as export advisors, designers, providers of technical knowhow’ s in interiors decorators and to carry on either alone or jointly with one or more persons, government, local or other bodies, the business of to undertake work of interior designers, erection and installation and to act as interior decorators, consultants, advisors, contractors, turnkey contractors and managers, and to do all incidental acts and things necessary for the attainment of the above objects.
name: HeenaNeha International LLP

idea:

name: ZIRCON ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are Robinhood for farmers. A perfect combination of Agritech and Fintech. We aims at bringing public investments to farmers to grow organic. Our online platform enable individual investors, households or any institutions to browse, select and invest directly in farmers/FPOs to grow 100% organic produces with an assured return on investment. Also anyone can buy & subscribe to organic veg baskets and other organic products.
name: EATGANIC FOOD & FIN PRIVATE LIMITED
